--- DateTime: 2021/12/15 14:12
---@class BattleLogicContext:SimpleClassUtil
local BattleLogicContext = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleLogicContext:initialize()
    --self._missileContext = MissileContext:new()
    self._entityContext = BattleEntityContext:new()
    self._logicSystemContext = BattleLogicSystemContext:new()

end

function BattleLogicContext:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
    --self._missileContext:init(30)
    self._entityContext:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)
    self._logicSystemContext:init(self._entityContext._list_camp)
end

function BattleLogicContext:update(dt)
    --if self._missileContext and self._missileContext.update then
    --    self._missileContext:update(dt)
    --end
    if self._entityContext and self._entityContext.update then
        self._entityContext:update(dt)
    end
    if self._logicSystemContext and self._logicSystemContext.update then
        self._logicSystemContext:update(dt)
    end

end

function BattleLogicContext:release()
    if self._entityContext and self._entityContext.release then
        self._entityContext:release()
    end
    if self._logicSystemContext and self._logicSystemContext.release then
        self._logicSystemContext:release()
    end
end
return BattleLogicContext
